post.body: Til Eulenspiegel is one of the best reasons to be a hornist.
about damn time, too!
on the third day of christmas, your callers cannot stop!
Congratulations! It's about damn time!
Heavily caffeinated, and mostly done with Christmas shopping. How about you?
I had that problem earlier... the trick was to post the tweet *before* Opera has a chance to finish loading the page.
they often think they do, though I think 12-steppers call that denial.
...though with me, I don't know that "fashionable" can really be applied to my lateness.
it's more about the snow. with these people, i really doubt it's too late to be fashionably late.
on the other hand, i'm *also* listening to Patsy Cline. This may prove a little dangerous.
what, you mean like a good night's sleep? but gossip is so fun!
When @chelpixie wakes up, I guess that means I have to go to bed. Good night!
Evening luck: Pro: don't have to go out in the snow; Con: don't get to go out to dinner and give a particular Christmas present.
The Courante is finally starting to go the way I want it. Awesome. Now I have to start working on everything else for this audition.
mmm... chamomile tea.
Question for you all out there: do you think I enjoy complicating my life?
Something tells me that going to the holiday party is not really in the cards tonight.
...and this Bach will be mine. But not before I go to sleep ton-- this morning.
...and now off to eat and caffeinate myself.
The Bach is still kicking my ass! It's so tricksy!
